sentences.english: "This is a first for the sub-glacial environment with that level of sophistication, " Ellis-Evans said.
sentences.chinese: 這是第一次對那麼複雜的冰下環境做勘測。

sentences.english: Surveyor 3 had landed two years earlier in the dark smudge at lowerright.
sentences.chinese: “勘測者3號”兩年前在右下角的黑點處着陸。

sentences.english: The high-density resistivity method is one of the effective methods in engineering surveying.
sentences.chinese: 高密度電阻率法是工程勘測的一種有效方法。

sentences.english: They surveyed the property to get the map drawn right.
sentences.chinese: 他們對這棟房產進行了勘測，以便正確繪製地圖。

sentences.english: The telemetry system is a data logger that records data over several days.
sentences.chinese: 遙感勘測系統是一個一些天以來記錄數據的數據樵夫。

sentences.english: The fishermen said the company's seismic survey was frightening away fish.
sentences.chinese: 漁民們說這家公司進行的地震勘測把魚都嚇跑了。

sentences.english: The surveyor integrated the area of all the farms into a total acreage of the township.
sentences.chinese: 勘測員把所有農田面積加進了小鎮的總面積。

sentences.english: They stopped and began to reconnoitre the terrain.
sentences.chinese: 他們停下來，開始勘測地形。

sentences.english: The bounds of the manor are minutely set out in the survey.
sentences.chinese: 莊園的邊界在本次勘測中被詳細地確定下來。

sentences.english: He spent three years in combat as a commander of a reconnaissance battery.
sentences.chinese: 他在戰爭中作爲一隻勘測隊的指揮官度過了三年。

sentences.english: The hydrometric cableway's current surveying system intelligent control box.
sentences.chinese: 比重計空中覽繩的當前的勘測的系統聰明的控制箱。

sentences.english: Nor is this China’s only oceanographic enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 然而這並非中國唯一的海洋學勘測計劃。

sentences.english: One of these survey ships was to be named H.M.S. Beagle.
sentences.chinese: 其中一艘勘測船將被命名爲英國艦隊貝格爾號。

sentences.english: The preface to the History of China Railway Survey is written by Mr.
sentences.chinese: 本文是孫永福副部長爲《鐵路勘測史》所作的序言。

sentences.english: People explore the ice. Bore it and sample.
sentences.chinese: 工作人員通過在冰裏鑽孔取樣來勘測結冰。

sentences.english: But even though you didn't identify the attacker, the intruder still managed to map your network.
sentences.chinese: 但雖然你沒有識別攻擊者，侵入者仍設法勘測貴網絡。

definition: Taichung or Taizhong county in central Taiwan
to dig out/to excavate/to scoop out
Chiatung township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
to repair in a rush/rush repairs
